content.question: ​The polynomial function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses open parentheses 3 x minus 1 close parentheses squared"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></math>. Which of the following descriptions of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a polynomial of degree <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math> with a leading coefficient of <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math>.
​​<math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a polynomial of degree <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math> with a leading coefficient of <math alttext="9"><mn>9</mn></math>.
​​<math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a polynomial of degree <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> with a leading coefficient of <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math>.
​​​<math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a polynomial of degree <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> with a leading coefficient of <math alttext="9"><mn>9</mn></math>.

content.answer: ​​​<math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a polynomial of degree <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> with a leading coefficient of <math alttext="9"><mn>9</mn></math>.

topic.text: 1.4: Polynomial Functions and Rates of Change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
